content:
CngKeyOpenOptions Enum

Definition

Specifies options for opening a key.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum CngKeyOpenOptions
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
CngKeyOpenOptions
Attributes
FlagsAttribute

Remarks

The Silent option suppresses any UI prompting. This option may not work with some key types, such as smart card keys and keys that are stored in the software key storage provider (KSP). These key types are protected with mandatory UI prompting.

Fields

MachineKey

A machine-wide key is opened.
None

No key open options are specified.
Silent

UI prompting is suppressed.
UserKey

If the MachineKey value is not specified, a user key is opened instead.
